reviewDetails.comment: He’s great!!!!
Wonderful, caring doctor. My family has gone to him for several  years
Dr. Rubin and his Staff are very professional. They take time to explain the procedures they are performing so you know what to expect.
Longer wait time and no relief from medication prescribed by him. Had to ultimately see another eye doctor as my eye condition got worsened after using medication prescribed by him.
Dr Rubin is very thorough , he does not rush and explains everything during your visit.

Dr, Rubin is professional and easy going - he made my visits pleasant despite the quite painful corneal abrasion that led me to him.  Would recommend him to anyone who is having eye issues!  The staff is courteous and helpful as well.
Finally diagnosed my eye condition and prescribed appropriate medication.  Very nice doctor.

reviewDetails.comment: I’ve been going to Dr. Greenberg for years now.  He gives a thorough exam every time and answers any questions I have.

Nothing much to tell . He advised me nothing was wrong & didn't really check my eyes ... other then reading an  eye chart ..as if I were there for glasses , however I was not .. very disappointed sums it up . I resorted back to my optometrist, for an ongoing issue that Dr Greenberg did not detect ..
Office staff friendly and helpful. Dr. Was thorough and answered all my questions.
Very thorough examination n also explained questions very well

Fabulous doctor, thorough, wonderful person.

Personable and thorough.  I have confidence in his expertise.
excellent
Friendly, professional, and caring Doctor and staff.

reviewDetails.comment: I was referred for a biopsy and he didn’t do one and made my months of seeing doctors seem like a waste of time as in I wasn’t in enormous pain and worried about malignancy.
I found Dr. Nia to be extremely competent and thorough. He explained what he was doing and why. My procedure required stitches and there is almost no sign of a scar at all.
Very Attentive to the patients needs
Professional, on time, and did a great job

reviewDetails.comment: Zukerman is a fabulous doctor! he ares about his patients and takes time to explain things clearly. I've had 3 surgeries with him and I highly recommend him

Love him. Excellent surgeon and quite attentive. Listens extremely well and is quite patient and understanding. Unfortunately, a huge discrepancy has occurred as a result of a knee aspiration he ordered on the day of my visit. I am now entangled in trying to have the hospital rescind a $2400 charge I have been billed for a procedure that should have been entirely covered by my insurance!
great an excellent Doctor

participatingProducts.description: Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus
Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Azar is a true professional and caring doctor a credit to NYU

She was knowledgeable and caring.  Experienced professional who responded to all my questions/concerns, and provided me with follow-up information.  This was a second opinion and she was much more experienced and detailed than my previous doctor.  I will continue my care with her.

Dr Azar is very thorough and caring and down to earth. She didn't keep me waiting in her office. She ordered a lot of additional tests to get to the bottom of my problem. She was also responsive through the NYU portal.  I think she is wonderful and I definitely recommend her.
Dr Azar is personable and knowledgeable. She also made herself available to contact me via messaging, so that is very much appreciated

I highly recommend Dr. Azar. I have been seeing various rheumatologists for over 18 years. Dr. Azar is the ONLY ONE  who accurately diagnosed that I have psoriatic arthritis. Unlike the other MDs, she listens attentitively to what I had to say and considers all of my symptoms -- not just my joints. I've been in her care for more than three years now and she has treated me with therapies that the other MDs never considered. I can't help but think how much better off I would be if I had seen a doctor as caring as Dr. Azar from the start. My condition would not be as bad as it is now, but with her, I feel for the very first time, that I am making progress.

She was so lovely! She was really personable, empathetic, and professional. I so appreciated how much she listened, her ability to educate on what might be causing my symptoms, her perspective on the necessity (or not) of treatment options and annual visits, and her clear instructions on next steps.

After the visit, I Slacked my entire office saying if they ever need a rheumatologist recommend, that I genuinely had a great rec!

Plus, I think it takes a *boss* woman to pull off being professional, direct, empathetic, and kind so effortlessly.

reviewDetails.comment: She’s excellent and very thorough. I wished all doctors were like her.
She's a very good diagnostician but has a very poor bedside manner.  I don't want my name associated with this review.
She's very thorough and knows her stuff. She is the best Rheumatologist I've been to.

Dr. Rackoff is very thorough and responsive. I especially like the NYC Langone app as all test results are readily available and you can message the doctor’s office, doctor and they reply. Dr. Rackoff actually called and discussed my test results directly with me. In my experience she does have a tendency of running more than 15’ late. I am accepting of that as I know when she was with me she was thorough, patient and answered all of my questions.
Absolutely would recommend Dr Rakoff.  Knowledgeable, attentive to details beyond the scope of my visit, personable.
Dr. Rackoff is an amazing physician. Extremely smart and empathetic. I feel very lucky that she’s my doctor.

Dr Rackoff is an excellent  doctor, very knowledgeable, caring, and take every precaution to ensure all tests have been performed.  She is patient and explains all details in a clear and precise way.
Highly recommend.

I would not recommend Dr. Rackoff.   I found her to be very unprofessional -- she was curt, impatient, nasty -- I was pretty upset after hanging up from a telemedicine call.  Never had such a negative experience like this.  I would never recommend her to anyone.

reviewDetails.comment: The surgery performed by Dr. Kwon went exactly like he had explained, and I am very happy with the outcome. Dr. Kwon is a very knowledgeable and caring physician.

Dr. Kwon was outstanding.  I had total confidence in his ability to perform the procedure (TSR).  He explained every aspect of the operation in a manner I could understand.  The follow up visit was very helpful in letting me know what to expect in the months to come.

schools.name: Univ Of Illinois Coll Of Med-Chicago

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Lee listened to my issues, provided me with helpful information and was patient and empathetic.

Absolutely!  Dr. Lee always provides stellar services!  She is very patient and answers every question I have with care and concern.  I love how she stays on top of my care and her goal is to keep me informed and more importantly, to keep me healthy.
On my first visit with Dr. Lee, she was very informative on providing me with information pertaining to my health.

Dr. Lee seemed disinterested and very disnissive. She was very hard to talk to. I felt she was not listening to me.
Her follow up was brief and left me with more questions then answers

Dr. Lee is great. She listened to my concerns and quickly provided comments without being dismissive. She was also communicative as to her concerns. She ordered tests and kept me posted while results were coming in, and quickly followed up with me once she had them all.

Dr. Lee is a good listener and diagnostician. Arthritis is a long-game strategy and it takes time to figure out the right med per individual. Dr. Lee is patient and thorough and I feel very comfortable continuing treatment with her towards this end.
Very thorough, really took the time to listen and understand my personal concerns. Didn't feel rushed in the appointment at all, felt very taken care of and that I was in good hands.
She is very thorough and knowledgeable and does not just prescribe medication she looks at the whole picture and analyzes from there.
